overview: Set in 2013 Monterrey, Poncho is a student at a prestigious college, he goes to get weed with his friend El Gre침as,  they go to La Bomba to get some. Although when La Bomba runs out of weed, they decide to take him on a quest to get more weed from El Perro.  When Poncho needs to go back home, La Bomba kidnaps both Poncho and Gre침as and taking Poncho's phone and car. La Bomba contacts Poncho's father to get him one million dollars to free his son, though Bomba didn't know the deadly consequences.
tagline: Nobody knows who you work for
title: The Bosses
